channel.title: Aws.amazon.com/Blogs/Dotnet on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Aws.amazon.com/Blogs/Dotnet on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Modernize ASP.NET Web Forms UI to Blazor with AWS Transform
item.description: AWS Transform is an agentic service that accelerates modernization, including .NET applications. With it, you can transform .NET Framework Windows applications to cross-platform .NET and reduce operating costs up to 40% by running on Linux. For ASP.NET web applications, AWS Transform can port the UI layer to ASP.NET Core. In this post, I’ll explain how […] Link to article: https://aws.amazon.com/blogs/dotnet/modernize-asp-net-web-forms-ui-to-blazor-with-aws-transform/
